content.text: I have a big dream for my future home. I want a room where I can set up my larp equipment and play without worrying about damaging the floors or walls.
That sounds like an awesome dream! I would love to have a room like that too. I love to play larp. What kind of larp do you play?
I love to play fantasy larp. I love the idea of creating a character and living in a fantasy world. What kind of larp do you like to play?
I love playing horror larp. I think it's so much fun to be scared and to have to use your imagination to survive.
I can see how that would be fun. I've never played horror larp before, but I'd be willing to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun. I'm sure you'd love it.
I'm glad you're so passionate about your hobbies. It's important to have things that you love to do.
I agree. I think it's important to have a balance between work and play.
I definitely agree. I love my job as an educator, but it's important for me to have time to relax and do things I enjoy.
That's great. It sounds like you have a really good life.
I do. I'm very grateful for what I have.
Me too. I'm glad to hear that you're happy.
